list.name: Default
list.comment: 1. refactor producer. now can send multiple batches of messages 2. adding bash function to interact with kafka easily (inside docker containers) 3

task.summary: 1. increase zk_max_timeout 2. set zk_max_conn to unlimited (both kafka 2.1 and 0.9) 3. set templates of kafka21 and kafka09 to override docker-compose.yml before deploy kafka 4. increase delay in makefile 8->15 for zk 5. add old-consumer (0.9) 6. adding 2 old dependencies 7. change producer1 topic for old-consumer testing

1. refactor producer. now can send multiple batches of messages 2. adding bash function to interact with kafka easily (inside docker containers) 3. add indentation in OldConsumer (multi-threaded) so each thread is pretty printed 4. change kafka libraries log-level to WARN so now only app logs appears
